body_html:
I'm not able to reproduce freezing after single eval. When I ran your example from http://pastebin.com/THNqB4ws it runs for >100 iterations, at which point I killed it. I've seen cases of a machine freezing to a point of requiring reboot when TensorFlow allocated too much memory.

If I put a pause after 100 iterations in your script, the memory usage returns to normal, so I guess that memory gets garbage collected eventually.

body:
I'm not able to reproduce freezing after single eval. When I ran your example from http://pastebin.com/THNqB4ws it runs for >100 iterations, at which point I killed it. I've seen cases of a machine freezing to a point of requiring reboot when TensorFlow allocated too much memory.

If I put a pause after 100 iterations in your script, the memory usage returns to normal, so I guess that memory gets garbage collected eventually.
